meaningMnemonic: Take your greatest <radical>treasure</radical>, hold a <radical>knife</radical> nice and close to it, and <kanji>prune</kanji> away all the weak and dead bits.
readingMnemonic: Currently, you want to <kanji>prune</kanji> your greatest treasure: your <reading>ca</reading>r (か). Your car is made of wood, and it keeps trying to grow new buds and branches, so you have to prune them off.
